algorithm_technique: Sort the array and iterate to find minimum difference and corresponding pairs.
problem_summary_simple: Find pairs with the smallest difference between any two numbers in an array.
problem_summary_technical: Sort the array to efficiently find adjacent elements with the minimum absolute difference, then collect all such pairs.
key_insights: Sorting is crucial to bring elements with small differences together.
Iterating through sorted adjacent elements is sufficient to find the minimum difference.
A second pass or careful single pass can collect all pairs with that minimum difference.
